僜字的基本解释

僜
chēng
酒醉走不稳跌跌撞撞。

僜
dēng
古通“登”。
中国西藏少数民族之一。

僜字的汉语字典释义

[①]［dèng］
［《廣韻》徒亙切，去嶝，定。］
(1)见“倰僜”。
(2)西藏地区少数民族名，居西藏察隅河谷。
[②]［chēng］
［《廣韻》丑升切，平蒸，徹。］
见“儚僜”。

僜字的康熙字典解释

【子集中】【人字部】　僜； 康熙笔画：14； 页码：页116第27
【集韻】【正韻】?唐亙切，音鄧。倰僜，不著事。　又行疲貌。　又【廣韻】【集韻】【韻會】?丑升切，音庱。義同。

僜字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
僜字的起名意思

暂无。

僜
Basic explanation of words
僜
chēng
Drunk and stumbled unsteadily.
僜
dēng
Gutong "boards".
One of China's Tibetan minority.
僜
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［dèng］
["Guangyun" cuts, goes, and sets. ]
(1) See "倰僜".
(2) Names of ethnic minorities in Tibet, living in the Chayu River Valley in Tibet.
[②] [chēng]
["Guangyun" Ugly rises and cuts, flat steaming, thorough. ]
See "儚僜".
僜
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Subset] [Human Character Department] 　僜; Kangxi Strokes: 14; Page Number: Page 116-27
[Ji Yun] [Zheng Yun]? Tang Genqie, Yin Deng.倰僜, don't worry.　I'm tired again.　 [Guang Yun] [Ji Yun] [Yun Hui]? Ugly rises to cut, Yin Qi. The same meaning.
